name: Beaver Madness
description:
Imagine it's the Christmas season and you're working at Roots. The catch, you're a beaver and you have to survive the day with your co-workers while geese raid your store.

Made in 48hrs for Global Game Jam Vancouver with a team of 6.

Programmer

Steven Kearney

Rafael Gazetti Bonfim

Designer

Willy Lee (myself)

Artist

Aranzazu Medina

Giovanna Gowmez
